item.title: Cider Jammy Dodgers
item.description: Ingredients 8 ounces (227 grams) butter unsalted, softened 2/3 cup (64 grams) granulated sugar 2 large eggs, room temperature 1 teaspoon vanilla extract 2 1/4 cups (330 grams) all-purpose flour 1/4 teaspoon salt 1/2 cup (64 grams) raspberry jam Directions Combine butter, sugar and eggs. Add the butter (227g) and sugar (64g) to a stand mixer or mixing bowl. Beat until light and fluffy. Add the eggs and continue to mix.
